price: ߊߟߊ߫ ߣߐ߬ ߓߊ߲߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߘߊ߲ߞߊ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߞߊ߬ ߖߌ߯ߖߌ߮ ߘߐߓߍ߲߬ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊߡߊ߬
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ سَعِيرًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha laʿana al-kāfirīna wa-aʿadda lahum saʿīran
